name: Elisabetta Di Nitto
content: Prof. Elisabetta Di Nitto Prof. Elisabetta Di Nitto Italiano English Skip to content HomeBio Projects Publications Research Teaching Cloud computing from a software engineering perspective course Course material Corso ASL Python 2018 (Italiano) Corsetto Python 2019 Research group and colleagues Theses Contacts Welcome to my home page Posted on 24/07/2013 by ASICT Hosting Welcome to my homepage! I’m a Full Professor at Politecnico di Milano. I’m teaching Software Engineering 2 and Informatica B (in Italian). My main research focuses are on cloud computing, self-adaptive systems, service-based systems, software process. Here you find my CV in pdf. A shorter CV is available here.
